channel.title: Import on DIV project
channel.description: Recent content in Import on DIV project

item.title: Importing human model to Blender
item.description: 1.Open Blender application, to import the make human model 2.File>user preference> files> Check auto run python script. 3.To add Makehuman importer 4.File>user preference> add ons> import-export> check make human importer 5.To Import the .mhx file go to files>import>make human(.mhx) 6.You can see the imported model on your workspace
